website_summaries.verdict: High-performance low-profile Kumho tires that deliver high-speed stability. Solid choice for handling control.
pros: High-tensile steel belt and jointless nylon cap construction for high-velocity handling
cons: Great for street use but not on rural roads

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have it mounted on my Can Am Spyder.good fit and improves handling
customer_reviews.author: Steve Harper

customer_reviews.title: Performing Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt. Tire was mounted on a 2013 Can Am Spyder RT-S. The tire was balanced with 4 oz. of balance beads. So far the tire is performing flawlessly. I would definitely recommend this for use on a Can Am Spyder.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: CanAM rear tire replacement
customer_reviews.text: This tire is the perfect replacement for the low milage stock tire. At 10,000 miles the stock tire was down to the wear bars. The Kumho tire has been run for over 20,000 with lots of tread life to spare by many riders. This tire required no changes to the factory balancing, and runs smooth at all speeds. I am looking forward to the longer maitainence interval.
customer_reviews.author: CLARKE E.

customer_reviews.title: Good Tire for a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: After recommending another site to order this tire from, I told my mechanic how much I paid for it on Amazon.com and he was shocked. He said I got a really good price for it. Way to go, Amazon.com!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Least expensive way to get a new rear tire for my Can-Am Spyder RT-S.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires for the price. If you need 225/50/15's these are your only choice unless you go to a full spec race tire which is not going to do good on the street. Lucky that the remaining street tire in this size is so good! Thanks Kumho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived on time and as described. Installed as ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and as described. Installed as rear tire on my F3-T Can Am Spyder notice little loss of stability in high speeds.
customer_reviews.author: gps123

customer_reviews.title: Can Am
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my Can Am Motorcycle, last longer than the tire the dealership sales. So far so good rides like a champ!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Spyder RT. Love the the ride. Can not believe the difference of the ride. My husband is planning on buy one for his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Still a big believer in the Kumho brand.. Great tire for the price! Has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: The whole process of buying and receiving went smooth; I did not have time to really drive with the new tires, but their aspect is awsome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great deal will have this installed in the next two days .
customer_reviews.author: Allan Emter

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire
customer_reviews.text: Tire arrived as scheduled with no issues. This tire replaces the Kenda tire on my 2018 Can-Am Spyder, looks good! Can't wait to get it installed and get riding.
customer_reviews.author: B Link

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The price was great, bike rides great if not better. I would buy another one and have recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, quiet, and balanced without any weight! ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, quiet, and balanced without any weight! Hope it wears longer than the stock tire for my Can Am Spyder. Will likely get one for my wife's Spyder next.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Toth

customer_reviews.title: ... tire replaced a Kendra and I have been very happy so far with the handling the way it holds ...
customer_reviews.text: The tire replaced a Kendra and I have been very happy so far with the handling the way it holds the road and the ride. I do feel it handles as go if not better than the Kendra it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Steffeck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tire for that old school look..
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a low profile tire to go on my 15x8 rims. Gave my truck that perfect 90's look.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan R.

customer_reviews.title: By the way I'm happy with purchase since i bought full
customer_reviews.text: What is the mileage range. And what mileage would be okay to rotate tires. By the way I'm happy with purchase since i bought full set

customer_reviews.text: 2013 Can Am Spyder. Arrived on time and exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Myron W. Guhlke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what my boyfriend wanted for his 84 Camaro, unfortunately only put 10 miles on it and the tire blew to shreds on highway!!!!! was very bummed out......
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Conner

customer_reviews.title: shiny
customer_reviews.text: black rubber , way cool tread , new , inexpensive , delivered fast , not noisy , just make sure you got a tire guy you can use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: the first set was GREAT, great traction fairly good wear and great wet ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the second set of this size and brand, the first set was GREAT, great traction fairly good wear and great wet traction ... BUT noisy, noisy, noisy and whiny also, the first set was made in Korea and were very high quality and wore well HOWEVER, the second set were made in China and just aren't the same quality tire anymore . I won't be buying these again ... Tire size 225/50-15 - they are a directional tire!
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

product_meta.title: Kumho Ecsta AST KU25 All-Season Tire - 225/50R15 91H
product_meta.description: The Ecsta AST combines exotic appearance, modern tread design and technology in one low-profile package, while delivering all-season, high performance grip and handling to the entry-level tuner enthusiast. An advanced belt package design is constructed using high-tensile steel belt and jointless nylon cap ply to reinforce the tread area, assuring high speed stability, while an ultra-hard bead filler maximizes lateral grip and high speed durability. The AST’s shoulder blocks feature a sharp leading edge and a rounded trailing edge to prevent heel and toe wear. The leading edge increases wet and snow traction by cutting through ice and water film. A rim protector in the lower sidewall safeguards wheel against scratches and abrasions.
feature_bullets: Advanced belt package constructed using high-tensile steel belt and jointless nylon cap ply to reinforce the tread area, assuring high speed stability
Outstanding all-season tread compound improves wear resistance and ride comfort
Shoulder blocks with sharp leading edge and a rounded trailing edge to prevent heel and toe wear
Ultra hard bead filler maximizes lateral grip and high speed durability
Rim protector in lower sidewall safeguards wheel against scratches and abrasions
